about_the_game:
Do you want a Wet 'n' Wild experience?

This free DLC lets you unlock the uncensored 18+ version of Girls Overboard, featuring bonus and alternate scenes with beautiful high-resolution illustrations.

Each girl is fully voiced, fully animated, and fully uncensored. The higher your relationship goes, the racier of situations you'll unlock!

CONTENTS:

  • Bonus dialogue and alternate dialogue with sexually suggestive and/or explicit themes.
  • Adds story scenes that contain sexual imagery and sounds.
  • Full nudity! Penetration and genitals are shown, uncensored.
  • Gallery Mode to replay unlocked scenes.
  • Unlock sexy outfits!

With the Wet 'n' Wild DLC patch, get ready to go ALL THE WAY!


WARNING: This DLC is intended only for adults 18 years of age or older and contains content which some players might find offensive.

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
